Author: rrayaa
Text: so don’t binge, make meal plans that add up to about 3000kcal a day, once u know what food u like and what does and doesn’t make your stomach hurt you can start eating whatever you want. recovery isn’t easy, your stomach will hurt at first, that’s why multiple small meals work better. (your stomach is really small right now and binges will hurt) i really wish you the best and i believe you can do it. recovery means choosing happiness and you deserve happiness! you can do it!
